description: Manages Solaris 11 Image Packaging System publishers

origin.description: A path or URL to the repository. Multiple values may be provided.

enabled.description: Is the repository enabled or disabled?

sticky.description: Packages installed from a sticky repository can only receive updates from that repository.

state.description: Whether to ensure that a publisher is present or absent.

mirror.description: A path or URL to the repository mirror. Multiple values may be provided.
